dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3326 IH: Persian Gulf Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Ansari introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To prohibit the use of Federal funds to rename the Persian Gulf, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Persian Gulf Act.

section.header: Prohibition on use of Federal funds to rename Persian Gulf

subsection.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, no Federal funds are authorized to be appropriated or otherwise made available to rename the Persian Gulf.
No law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States may refer to the Persian Gulf by a different name without express authorization of Congress.
